definition: the current imperial dynasty/one's own court
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards

sentences.english: Arrest, bath in st toward the dream.

definition: state/country/the Gods of earth and grain
enlightened sage/brilliant master (flattering words applied to ruler)
the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
to lie prostrate/to prostrate oneself (in veneration)
former kings/former emperors/in Confucian writing, refers esp. to the sage rulers Yao 堯|尧[Yao2], Shun 舜[Shun4], Yu 禹[Yu3], Tang 湯|汤[Tang1] and the kings of Zhou
the Xin dynasty (8-23 AD) of Wang Mang 王莽, forming the interregnum between the former and later Han
Great Ancestor (posthumous title, e.g. for the founder of a dynasty)
